data.client_settings: Canary 0.0.170 (Build 6864), also happens on iOS (and possible other) platform
data.actual_result: The Trello link preview stays below the message, even though the link is escaped with <> around it (which is visible if you edit/copy the message)
data.expected_result: The preview of the Trello URL disappears, like it'd with other links (you can try sending an Imgur link and then editing <> around it for example, the preview disappears)
data.short_description: After sending a message with an unescaped Trello URL, editing in a set of <> brackets around the URL won't remove preview/embed
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message containing a Trello URL, link preview should appear under the message - Edit the message and add <> around the Trello URL and save the edit
